de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.crowdflower

Class NamedEntityTaskManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.crowdflower.NamedEntityTaskManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class NamedEntityTaskManager
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Class to manage data generation for German Named Entity tasks on Crowdflower. Uses Crowdclient to upload and create jobs.
    Author:
    Benjamin Milde
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • createJob

        public CrowdJob createJob(String template)
                   throws org.codehaus.jackson.JsonProcessingException,
                          IOException
        Generates a new job on crowdflower.com based on the supplied template string. The new job won't have any data items
        Parameters:
        template - - template as JSON string to use for the new job
        Returns:
        Throws:
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonProcessingException
        IOException

      • generateTask1Data

        public List<NamedEntityTask1Data> generateTask1Data(List<org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas> documentsJCas,
                                           int goldOffset,
                                           boolean generateGold,
                                           int limit)
                                             throws CrowdException
        Generate data for NER task1. This is a quite specific function exclusively for German NER, but a more general version could one day replace this. You usually call this function twice, one time to generate gold data (generateGold=true) and one time to generate normal data
        Parameters:
        documentsJCas - List of Cas containing either the documents to be annotated or gold documents
        goldOffset - This is an offset to the token number that is send to Crowdflower, so that (i - goldOffset) = real token offset in webanno. This is needed so that continuous token numbers can be send to Crowdflower
        generateGold - - whether gold data should be produced or normal data
        limit - - limit number of data items to this number
        Returns:
        Vector, representing a crowdflower task1 data upload. It can be directly mapped to JSON.
        Throws:
        CrowdException

      • uploadNewNERTask1

        public String uploadNewNERTask1(String template,
                       List<org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas> documentsJCas,
                       List<org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas> goldsJCas,
                       int useSents,
                       int useGoldSents)
                         throws org.codehaus.jackson.JsonProcessingException,
                                IOException,
                                Exception
        Upload a new NER task1 (German) to crowdflower.com. This method is called from the crowd page and is the starting point for a new task1 upload.
        Parameters:
        template - - template as string to be used to upload the job
        documentsJCas - - list of source documents to be annotated
        goldsJCas - - gold data which should be used
        useSents - - number of sentences to use
        useGoldSents - - number of gold sentences to use
        Returns:
        Throws:
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonProcessingException
        IOException
        Exception

        Parameters:

        jobID2 - - Job ID or empty string
